summary: Set in the future when water is hard to find, a teenage boy sets out to protect his family and survive.
cast: Michael Shannon|Nicholas Hoult|Elle Fanning|Kodi Smit-McPhee|Robert Hobbs|David Butler|Aimee Mullins|Christy Pankhurst|Alex McGregor|David Clatworthy|Liah O'Prey|Carel Nel|Andy McPhee|Barry Armitage|Ben Horowitz|Rachel Wood|Charles Tertiens|Gideon van Schoor|Karen Snyman|Vlam Beukes|Olan Liebenberg|Gustav de Vries|David van der Westhuizen
title: Young Ones
